summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous resolutions and statements on Côte d'Ivoire and the subregion,

Noting the Secretary-General's letter of 22 November 2010 on the planned run-off elections on 28 November 2010,

Recalling inter-mission cooperation arrangements (1609, 2005),

Supporting UNMIL's mandate,

Determining the situation in Côte d'Ivoire poses a threat to international peace and security,

Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,

1. Authorizes the Secretary-General to temporarily redeploy from UNMIL to UNOCI for up to four weeks: 
   - a maximum of three infantry companies 
   - an aviation unit with two military utility helicopters;

2. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
